name: Ray Dream Studio Scene File
summary: Learn about .RDS files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Ray Dream Studio was developed primarily in the 1990s and is no longer supported. MetaCreations was purchased by Eovia and then by DAZ Productions, who provides some software products that can import the RDS format.

description: 3D scene created by Ray Dream Studio, an older 3D drawing and animation program originally developed by MetaCreations; contains three-dimensional objects and animation settings; supports lighting, textures, shading, and other effects.
